犽字的基本解释

犽
yà
古书上说的一种似獾的动物。
中国古代少数民族之一。

犽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yà］
［《廣韻》吾駕切，去禡，疑。］
兽名。似獾。

犽字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　犽； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页707第07
【廣韻】【集韻】?吾駕切，音迓。【玉篇】獸似獾。　又【集韻】牛加切，音牙。義同。

犽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
犽字的起名意思

暂无。

Ya
Basic explanation of words
Ya
yà
An animal that resembles a badger in ancient books.
One of the ethnic minorities in ancient China.
Ya
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yà］
["Guangyun" I drive to cut, go to the 禡, suspicious. ]
Animal name. Like a badger.
Ya
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Dog Character Department] 　犽; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 707 No. 07
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? I drive and cut, the sound is lingering. [Jade articles] The beast is like a badger.　[Jiyun] Niu Jiaqie, Yinya. The same meaning.
